statements: SELECT * FROM media_ownership;
SELECT company_name, owner_name FROM media_ownership WHERE ownership_percentage > 50;
SELECT * FROM media_ownership ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT company_name, owner_name, ownership_percentage FROM media_ownership WHERE parent_company_id IS NULL;
SELECT AVG(ownership_percentage) AS average_percentage FROM media_ownership;
SELECT * FROM media_ownership WHERE ownership_percentage > 50 ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT media_company_id, company_name, owner_name FROM media_ownership WHERE parent_company_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT ownership_percentage, company_name FROM media_ownership WHERE owner_name LIKE 'A%' AND ownership_percentage <= 30;
SELECT * FROM media_ownership WHERE parent_company_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY owner_name DESC, media_company_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT company_name FROM media_ownership WHERE ownership_percentage > 75;
SELECT * FROM media_companies;
SELECT company_name, parent_company_id FROM media_companies ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT company_name, parent_company_id FROM media_companies ORDER BY parent_company_id DESC;
SELECT company_name, parent_company_id FROM media_companies WHERE parent_company_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM company_ownership WHERE shares_owned > 5;
SELECT * FROM media_companies WHERE company_id = 10;
SELECT company_name, parent_company_id FROM media_companies WHERE parent_company_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY company_name ASC;

SELECT media_companies.company_name, SUM(company_ownership.shares_owned) AS total_shares FROM media_companies JOIN company_ownership ON media_companies.company_id = company_ownership.company_id GROUP BY media_companies.company_name;

SELECT company_name, shareholder_name, shares_owned FROM media_companies JOIN company_ownership ON media_companies.company_id = company_ownership.company_id WHERE shares_owned > 1000 ORDER BY shares_owned DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT parent_company_id FROM media_companies ORDER BY parent_company_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM MediaCompanies;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM MediaCompanies ORDER BY industry;
SELECT company_name, parent_company_id FROM MediaCompanies WHERE parent_company_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM CompanyOwnership WHERE ownership_percent > 50;
SELECT report_id, report_date, regulatory_body FROM RegulatoryReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MediaCompanies WHERE industry = 'Broadcasting';
SELECT company_name, industry FROM MediaCompanies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, parent_company_id FROM MediaCompanies WHERE parent_company_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM CompanyOwnership WHERE ownership_percent >= 50;
SELECT company_name, COUNT(report_id) AS num_reports FROM MediaCompanies JOIN RegulatoryReports ON MediaCompanies.id = RegulatoryReports.company_id GROUP BY company_name ORDER BY num_reports DESC;
SELECT * FROM Media_Companies;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM Media_Companies ORDER BY industry DESC;
SELECT country, COUNT(*) FROM Media_Companies GROUP BY country;
SELECT company_name FROM Media_Companies WHERE industry = 'Entertainment';
SELECT * FROM Company_Ownership WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Media_Companies;
SELECT company_name, industry, country FROM Media_Companies WHERE industry = 'Entertainment';

SELECT company_name, owner_name, percentage_owned FROM Media_Companies JOIN Company_Ownership ON Media_Companies.company_id = Company_Ownership.company_id JOIN Owners ON Company_Ownership.owner_id = Owners.owner_id;
SELECT company_name, report_date, regulatory_body FROM Media_Companies JOIN Regulatory_Reports ON Media_Companies.company_id = Regulatory_Reports.company_id WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT company_name, country, COUNT(owner_id) AS total_owners FROM Media_Companies JOIN Company_Ownership ON Media_Companies.company_id = Company_Ownership.company_id GROUP BY company_name, country ORDER BY total_owners DESC;
SELECT * FROM media_company;
SELECT name, revenue FROM media_company ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT name, country FROM parent_company WHERE country='USA';
SELECT name, subsidiary_id FROM subsidiary_company WHERE parent_id=3;
SELECT id, name, nationality FROM shareholder WHERE nationality='Canadian';
SELECT * FROM media_company ORDER BY name DESC, revenue ASC;
SELECT name, revenue FROM media_company WHERE revenue > 1000000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;

SELECT parent_company.name, subsidiary_company.name, shareholder.name FROM parent_company JOIN subsidiary_company ON parent_company.id = subsidiary_company.parent_id JOIN ownership_structure ON subsidiary_company.id = ownership_structure.subsidiary_id JOIN shareholder ON ownership_structure.shareholder_id = shareholder.id WHERE parent_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM subsidiary_company WHERE name LIKE 'C%' AND parent_id IN (SELECT id FROM parent_company WHERE country = 'USA');

SELECT parent_company.name, SUM(media_company.revenue) AS total_revenue FROM parent_company JOIN subsidiary_company ON parent_company.id = subsidiary_company.parent_id JOIN ownership_structure ON subsidiary_company.id = ownership_structure.subsidiary_id JOIN media_company ON ownership_structure.shareholder_id = media_company.id GROUP BY parent_company.name ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
